import React from 'react';
import { NavLink, HashRouter } from 'react-router-dom';
import './App.css';

class App extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      todos: [{
        id: 1,
        text: 'ä½ å¥½',
        isCompleted: false
      }],
      filter: window.location.hash.split("/").pop() || 'All',
      inputText: ''
    };
    this.states = ['All', 'Active', 'Completed'];
  }

  handleDelete = (id) => {
    this.setState({
      todos: this.state.todos.filter(todo => todo.id !== id)
    });
  }

  handleInputKeyDown = (event) => {
    if (event.keyCode === 13) {
      const { todos, inputText } = this.state;
      this.setState({
        todos: [...todos, {
          id: todos.length + 1,
          text: inputText,
          isCompleted: false
        }],
        inputText: ''
      })
    }
  }

  handleToggleState = todo => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    // debugger;
    // let/ newTodo = Object.assign({}, todo); //è¿™é‡Œç–‘ä¼¼ä¿®æ”¹äº†åŸæ•°æ®
    let newTodo = todos.find(v => v === todo);
    newTodo.isCompleted = !newTodo.isCompleted;
    this.setState({
      // todos: Object.assign([], todos,
      // Object.assign(newTodo, { isCompleted: !newTodo.isCompleted }))
      todos
    });
  }

  handleChangeTodoText = todo => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    let newTodo = todos.find(v => v === todo);
    newTodo.isEditing = true;
    this.setState({
      todos
    });
  }

  refreshTodos = () => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    // å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘ä»…ä¿®æ”¹ä¸€é¡¹
    this.setState({
      todos: todos.map(todo => Object.assign({}, todo, { isEditing: false }))
    });
  }

  handleCompleteAll = () => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    this.setState({
      todos: todos.map(todo => Object.assign({}, todo, { isCompleted: true }))
    });
  }

  render() {
    const { inputText, todos, filter } = this.state;
    return (
      <div className="App" >
        <HashRouter>
          <header className="App-header">
            <h1>todos</h1>
            <div className="header">
              {todos.filter(todo => todo.isCompleted === filter || filter === "All").length > 0 && <button onClick={this.handleCompleteAll}>å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆ</button>}
              <input
                className="inputText"
                value={inputText}
                placeholder="What need to be done ï¼Ÿ"
                onChange={e => this.setState({ inputText: e.target.value })}
                onKeyDown={this.handleInputKeyDown}
              />
            </div>
            {todos.length > 0 && (
              <React.Fragment>
                <ul className="todos">
                  {todos.filter(todo => (filter === "Active" && !todo.isCompleted) || (filter === "Completed" && todo.isCompleted) || filter === "All").map((todo) => {
                    return (
                      <li key={todo.id} className="todo">
                        <input
                          type="checkbox"
                          checked={todo.isCompleted}
                          onChange={() => this.handleToggleState(todo)}
                        />
                        <p
                          className={todo.isCompleted ? "completed" : ""}
                          onDoubleClick={() => this.handleChangeTodoText(todo)}
                          onBlur={this.refreshTodos}
                        >
                          {todo.isEditing ? (
                            <input value={todo.text} onChange={e => {
                              const newTodos = [...todos];
                              const newTodo = newTodos.find(v => v === todo);
                              newTodo.text = e.target.value;
                              this.setState({
                                todos: newTodos
                              })
                            }} />
                          ) : todo.text}
                        </p>
                        <button className="delete" onClick={() => this.handleDelete(todo.id)}></button>
                      </li>
                    )
                  })}
                </ul>
              </React.Fragment>
            )}
            {todos.length > 0 && (
              <div className="bar">
                <span>{todos.length} items left</span>
                <div>
                  {this.states.map(state => (
                    <NavLink
                      to={state}
                      key={state}
                      className="state"
                      onClick={() => this.setState({ filter: state })}
                    // activeClassName="active"
                    >
                      {state}
                    </NavLink>
                  ))}
                </div>
                <div></div>
              </div>
            )}
          </header>
        </HashRouter>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default App;
